Build Extensions for Bible Translation

An open source opportunity for you to put tech innovations into the hands of Bible Translators. Create collaborative tools for the Bible translation community to reach the nations with Scripture.

TypeScript & React
12K+ users in Paratext
3537+ content languages

API Resources

Everything you need to build powerful extensions for Platform.Bible. Each resource provides comprehensive documentation and examples.

platform-bible-react

Platform.Bible React

React UI components and hooks that allow developers of Platform.Bible extensions to have the same look and feel as the main application.

API Documentation Design System

platform-bible-utils

Platform.Bible Utils

A set of utility functions, types, and classes for use inside Platform.Bible and extensions.

API Documentation

papi-dts

paranext-core/lib/papi-dts

Types declarations for PAPI interactions in Platform.Bible extensions.

Type Declarations

Contributors

We are an open-source platform designed to bring developers and translators together for a common purpose—translating scripture for all nations and language communities. In Platform, developers create extensions using our API, and these can be offered in the Extension Marketplace in Paratext 10 Studio for translators to add to their scripture editor.
